phrs.translation: 力士, 饲料甜菜, 甜菜类, 饲料用甜菜
饲牛甜菜, 饲料甜菜, 一种饲牛用的甜菜

sentences.sentence: The mangel has been a great friend to the traditional British farmer.
sentences.translation: 饲料甜菜一直是传统英国农民的好帮手。

sentences.sentence: I think all I ask now, is that the mangel-wurzel is not allowed to die out.
sentences.translation: 我想我现在所要求的，就是不能让 mangel-wurzel 这种甜菜消失。

sentences.sentence: But my dreams lie shattered across the desks of the seed merchants who insist there is no mangel seed to be found.
sentences.translation: 但我的梦想破灭了，散落在种子商人的桌子上，他们坚持说找不到甜菜种子。
